China: Huanzong was overthrown in a coup. Emperor Xiangzong of Western Xia became emperor of Western Xia.
Estonia: Valdemar II of Denmark builds a fortress in Saaremaa, but burns it down after finding no volunteers to man it.
India: Raja Prithu defeats Muhammad bin Bakhtiyar Khalji, destroying his army of 12,000 with only about 100 survivors.
Latvia: The Brothers of the Sword and their Semigallian allies defeated Livonians at Turaida
